Definition:
In this task, you're given malayalam statements that contain mentions of names of people, places, or things. Some of these mentions refer to the same person, place, or thing. Your job is to evaluate one's understanding of such references and classify them based on their rating of offensiveness. Good questions are expected to predict the offensiveness of the statement based on mentions to people, places, or things to which they may refer. Good questions are expected to predict the offensiveness of the statement based on mentions to people, places, or things to which they may refer. 
Integer from 0 to 5 that corresponds to these values: 0. Not_offensive 1. Offensive_Untargetede 2. Offensive_Targeted_Insult_Individual 3. Offensive_Targeted_Insult_Group 4. Offensive_Targeted_Insult_Other 5. not-Malayalam. 
Things to avoid: 1. Avoid questions that can be answered correctly without actually understanding the paragraph. 2. Avoid questions that do not link phrases referring to the same entity, 3. Avoid questions that have multiple answers. 

Emphasis & Caution: 1. For each of your questions the answer should be one or more phrases in the paragraph, 2. The answer for each question should be unambiguous.

Positive Examples.explanation: This statement "‡¥™‡µÅ‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡µª‡¥™‡¥≥‡µç‡¥≥‡¥ø ‡¥ú‡µã‡¥∏‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç ‡¥á‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥ü‡µÜ  ‡¥´‡¥æ‡µª‡¥∏‡µç‌ ‡¥á‡¥≤‡µç‡¥≤‡µÜ‡¥ü‡¥æ  ‡¥é‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç  ‡¥™‡¥ü‡¥Ç ‡¥ï‡µä‡¥≥‡µÅ‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥â‡¥±‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥æ" indicates that the person "Puthenpalli Jose" has no fans in that particular area and would be easy to get a picture of him. This is a positive example because the statement is not offensive to any person or place or thing and is classfied as not offensive.

This statement is a negative comment on "thendikal aanello". This is a positive example because the statement is an offensive statement in general and is classified as an offensive untargeted statement.

Negative Examples.input: Super trailor katta ikka fanaya ‡¥é‡¥®‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥µ‡¥∞‡µÜ romanjification
Negative Examples.explanation: The statement is a positive comment about a movie. This would be a negative example because it is not offensive to any individual or place or group or thing and it is classified as as offensive statement targetting an individual.

This statement is an information about a competition between the person "Poovankozhi" and the person "Maamangkam". This is a negative example because there is nothing offensive about any person or group or place and yet it is classified as it is offensive to an group.
